Text: Holiday Specials from HawaiitropicalscomPST Aloha Youre receiving this newsletter as a customer or contestant of hawaiitropicalscom because of a special promotion If you do not wish to receive updates about our products and services reply with not interested and well remove your name from our mailing list Please be sure you send your removal request with the right email address that you or other persons using your account entered our contest with This is a special offering for our customers to take a discount by ordering early Please mention this Email to get your discount Mahalo NEW ITEM Lucky Bamboo Braided Cylinder For the first time and just in time for the Chinese New Year Aina is offering gift boxes of Lucky Bamboo This braided cylinder contains separate pieces carefully and patiently woven together Ship cylinders to the same address and save over See our other selections in the Chinese New Year section today lucbambraidchtml French Kiss Valentines Bouquet TAKING VALENTINE PREORDERS NOW available for arrival beginning February th This holiday gift box from Costa Rica consists of french kiss costus premium vibrant red gingers heliconia and red ti leaves A great value and specially priced at only Order the French Kiss pictured here or other tropical bouquets in our the Valentines Day section frenkisvaldahtml Mahalo Robert Holt East Kawailani Street Hilo Hawaii Toll Free voice email
